body: 16 (return) [ The oblique distance between Sestus and Abydus was thirty stadia. The improbable tale of Hero and Leander is exposed by M. Mahudel, but is defended on the authority of poets and medals by M. de la Nauze. See the AcadŽmie des Inscriptions, tom. vii. Hist. p. 74. elem. p. 240. Note: The practical illustration of the possibility of LeanderÕs feat by Lord Byron and other English swimmers is too well known to need particularly referenceÑM.]
